title: Combinatorial Qmod Workshop For Maxcut
subtitle: Combinatorial Optimization Workshop using the Qmod quantum types - part 1
description: This workshop solves the MaxCut problem using Qmod quantum types (QBit, phase) and the Classiq platform. It introduces the Maximum Cut formulation, derives the objective in gate form, and walks through solving it with QAOA. Includes TODOs and solution blocks for hands-on practice.
